summary.Title: Cleaning assistant part time
summary.Presentation: Join Our Team at Cklar Service! One of our valued colleagues will soon be leaving us, and we are therefore looking for a new assistant to join our already fantastic team.

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Join Our Team at Cklar Service!

One of our valued colleagues will soon be leaving us, and we are therefore looking for a new assistant to join our already fantastic team.
Are you the one we’re looking for?

Cklar Service is a traditional cleaning company established in 2006.
From the beginning, we’ve cherished a friendly, informal, and social work environment that people enjoy being part of. Today, the Cklar family consists of approximately 50 fantastic employees from around the world.

Our customers are a diverse mix, including offices, common areas, restaurants, staircases, private homes, and more.
We can offer you a varied workday with many different tasks in a multicultural company.

What we offer:

  • A part-time position of 11,75 hours per week.
  • Student friendly weekend hours 2 days a week, with the hours shared evenly between the days.
  • Salary based on qualifications.
  • A company car is provided

What we expect from you:

  • You can communicate well in either English or Danish.
  • You can work independently and follow instructions.
  • You are committed, positive, and motivated to make a difference.
  • That you have a valid driving license (we will provide a company car)

Interested?
Send your application and CV  and to job@cklar.dk (remember to write "Part-time" in the subject line).

Please note that we unfortunately cannot respond to all applicants. If you haven’t heard from us within a week of the deadline, the position has been filled.

—————————————————————

Bliv en del af vores team hos Cklar Service!

En af vores betroede medarbejdere forlader os desværre snart, og vi søger derfor hendes afløser.
Er det dig, vi leder efter?

Cklar Service er et traditionelt rengøringsfirma grundlagt i 2006.
Vi værdsætter en venlig, uformel og social omgangstone, som gør vores arbejdsplads til et sted, man har lyst til at være. I dag beskæftiger vi cirka 50 fantastiske medarbejdere fordelt over det meste af Østjylland.

Vores kundesegment spænder bredt og inkluderer kontorer, fællesarealer, restauranter, butikker, trapper, private hjem og meget mere.
Vi tilbyder en spændende og varieret hverdag i et multikulturelt firma.

Vi tilbyder:

  • En deltidsstilling på 11,75 timer ugentligt.
  • Weekend timer 2 dage om ugen.
  • Løn efter kvalifikationer.
  • Firmabil stilles til rådighed.

Vi forventer:

  • At du kan kommunikere godt på enten dansk eller engelsk.
  • At du kan arbejde selvstændigt og følge instruktioner.
  • At du er positivt indstillet og motiveret til at gøre en forskel.
  • At du har et gyldigt kørekort til personbil

Interesseret?
Send din ansøgning og CV med billede til job@cklar.dk

Husk venligst at skrive "Deltid" i emnefeltet.
Hvis du ikke har hørt fra os en uge efter ansøgningsfristen, må du betragte stillingen som besat.
